Loading required package: pacman

               sjlabelled, pollster, janitor, magrittr, GGally, corrr) #carga los paquetes listados

title: Taller 4
text:
Datos —
https://github.com/aniuxa/taller_meg/raw/main/datos/ICE_2022.xlsx

ICE_2022 <- readxl::read_excel("datos/ICE_2022.xlsx") %>%  clean_names()

New names:
• `` -> `...75`

title: Taller 4
text:
Descriptivos bivariados: cuanti vs cuanti

ICE_2022 %>%
  select(-c(id, edo)) %>%
  select(1:10) %>% 
  GGally::ggpairs()





ICE_2022 %>%
 with(
   correlate(homicidios, secuestros)
 )

Correlation computed with
• Method: 'pearson'
• Missing treated using: 'pairwise.complete.obs'


# A tibble: 1 × 2
  term      x
  <chr> <dbl>
1 x     0.463



ICE_2022 %>%
 with(
   lm(homicidios ~  secuestros)
 )


Call:
lm(formula = homicidios ~ secuestros)

Coefficients:
(Intercept)   secuestros  
      9.177       31.301
